Generals,

in this update:

- we've added support of iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR;
- fixes for better support of iPhone X;
- minor fixes and stability improvements.

Let the battle rage on, and thanks for playing with us!

Military maps corrected according to the latest intelligence data;
Additional divisions are moved closer to the borders;
Added a dialog with the user agreement;
Minor fixes and stability improvements.

Let the battle rage on, and thanks for playing with us!

We've been hard at work making the "Strategy & Tactics Sandbox WW2" game better for you.

For this version, we've made several bug fixes and performance enhancements to make sure everything's running as smoothly as possible.
